description: Combustion air motor current too low
actions: Check / replace combustion air motor
Check / replace cable harness

description: Combustion air motor current too high
actions: Check / replace combustion air motor
Check / replace cable harness
Replace the electronics, enter heater serial number on the new electronics using the Diagnose Tool

description: Combustion air temperature sensor out of tolerance
actions: Check / replace combustion air thermostat plate and cable harness
Ensure 12 V voltage under load at appliance input and check for AC voltage components that can be generated by the power supply unit or solar system.
Replace the electronics, enter heater serial number on the new electronics using the Diagnose Tool
Ensure 12 V voltage under load at appliance input and check for AC voltage components that can be generated by the power supply unit or solar system.
Replace the electronics, enter heater serial number on the new electronics using the Diagnose Tool
Ensure 12 V voltage under load at appliance input and check for AC voltage components that can be generated by the power supply unit or solar system.
Replace the electronics, enter heater serial number on the new electronics using the Diagnose Tool
Switch off heater and allow it to cool down. Fill boiler with water
Inspect the individual discharge openings / remove blockage to circulated air intake
Inspect heater for frost damage
Inspect the individual discharge openings / remove blockage to circulated air intake

description: Electronics do not match the heater (e.g. 6 kW PCB in 4 kW heater) 1. Action
Water temperature sensor out of tolerance
actions: Replace water temperature monitoring cable harness

description: Room temperature sensor out of tolerance
actions: Check cable for room temperature sensor and plug connections
Check (measure) / replace room temperature sensor 15 °C 16.2 kOhm 20 °C 12.6 kOhm 25 °C 10.0 kOhm

description: Air temperature sensor out of tolerance
actions: Replace thermostat plate kit LTF
Ensure 12 V voltage under load at appliance input and check for AC voltage components that can be generated by the power supply unit or solar system.
Replace the electronics, enter heater serial number on the new electronics using the Diagnose Tool

description: Risk of low voltage. Battery voltage too low < 10.4 V
actions: Ensure 12 V voltage under load at appliance input and check for AC voltage components that can be generated by the power supply unit or solar system.

description: Circulating air motor current too low
actions: Check circulating air motor plug connection
Replace circulating air motor

description: Circulating air motor current too high
actions: Replace circulating air motor

description: Control panel or control panel cable defective
actions: Check / replace control panel cable
Replace control panel

description: FrostControl heating element current too high
actions: Replace heating element

description: 2 KW solenoid valve pickup coil current too high
actions: Replace cable harness

description: 4 KW solenoid valve pickup coil current too high
actions: Replace cable harness
Ensure 12 V voltage under load at appliance input and check for AC voltage components that can be generated by the power supply unit or solar system.
Replace the electronics, enter heater serial number on the new electronics using the Diagnose Tool

description: 2 KW solenoid valve holding coil current too high
actions: Replace cable harness

description: 4 KW solenoid valve holding coil current too high
actions: Replace cable harness

Replace the electronics, enter heater serial number on the new electronics using the Diagnose Tool

description: - Electronics blocked- Because air temperature switch and / or water temperature switchhas opened during operation due to overheating- Because combustion air temperature sensor signals temperatures > 215 °C
actions: - Check heat exchanger for overheating damage
- Check water container for frost damage
- Check / replace water temperature cable harness
- Check thermostat plate LTF for damage / replace
- Check circulating air system for blockage
- Check / replace circulating air motor
- from software version V 03.00.00, unlock electronics with TrumaDiagnose Tool
- up to software version V 02.99.99, replace electronics and enterheater serial number on the new electronics using the Diagnose Tool

description: - Window switch detects open window- Bridge for window switch on Truma electronics interrupted
actions: - Close window
- Check / replace window switch with cable
Check bridge on PCB for secure fit / contact
Ensure 12 V voltage under load at appliance input and check for AC voltage components that can be generated by the power supply unit or solar system.
Ensure 12 V voltage under load at appliance input and check for AC voltage components that can be generated by the power supply unit or solar system.
Ensure 230 V power supply at appliance input
- Reset / check 230 V water temperature switch
- Check / replace 230 V fuse on Combi 230 V electronics
Replace Combi 230 V electronics

description: - 1) Circulating air motor faulty 2) Combi control panel or controlpanel cable faulty- Combi E power selector switch or control panel connecting cable faulty 3) Cable harness faulty
actions: Replace circulating air motor
- Replace Combi control panel / control panel cable
- Replace Combi E power selector switch or control panel connectingcable
- Combustion air motor supply cable, check black cable for short circuit or red cable for breakage
- Replace cable harness
- Replace combustion air motor if cable harness is undamaged
Ensure 12 V voltage under load at appliance input and check for AC voltage components that can be generated by the power supply unit or solar system.
Replace the electronics, enter heater serial number on the new electronics using the Diagnose Tool

description: - Because air temperature switch and / or water temperature switchhas opened during operation due to overheating- Because combustion air temperature sensor signals temperatures > 215 °C
actions: - Check heat exchanger for overheating damage
- Check water container for frost damage
- Check / replace water temperature cable harness
- Check thermostat plate LTF for damage / replace
- Check circulating air system for blockage
- Check / replace circulating air motor
- from software version V 03.00.00, unlock electronics with Truma Diagnose Tool
- up to software version V 02.99.99, replace electronics and enterheater serial number on the new electronics using the Diagnose Tool

- Check / replace control panel cable
